DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate hypothesis piezotome-corticision procedure transient acceleratory effect rate tooth alignment overall treatment time . In addition , subject piezotome-corticision orthodontics group experience different level pain , comfort , satisfaction oppose conventional orthodontics group .
DOC.detailed_description: This study specifically try : 1 . To compare time require achieve complete alignment crowd mandibular anterior teeth ( canine canine ) piezotome-corticision assisted conventional orthodontics . 2 . To investigate rate alignment mandibular anterior teeth different time point complete alignment achieve use dental cast take every visit . 3 . To compare subject 's perception pain , comfort satisfaction piezotome-corticision assist conventional orthodontics use two questionnaire . Eligibility criterion include : - Adult patient 18 old - Single arch double arch treatment - Non-extraction treatment mandibular arch - Presence full complement dentition first molar first molar - No space mandibular arch - Mandibular anterior irregularity index great 5 - Patient healthy periodontium attachment loss 2mm - The amount crowd allow bracket placement - No therapeutic intervention plan involve intermaxillary intraoral extraoral appliance include elastic , lip bumper , maxillary expansion appliance , headgear prior complete alignment mandibular anterior teeth . Exclusion criterion include : - Failure provide oral write consent participation - Medical problem affect tooth movement ( Refer Appendix I ) - Presence primary teeth mandibular anterior area - Missing permanent mandibular anterior teeth - Inability place bracket anterior mandibular teeth - Breakage mandibular anterior bracket replace within week Outcome measure 1 . Two outcome assessor calibrate assessment Little 's irregularity index . The irregularity index measure twice two blind outcome assessor use fine-tip digital caliper . 2 . The subject instruct record level pain : immediately , 1 hour , 12 hour , 7 day first wire placement [ 76 , 82 ] . They also ask report take pain medication , level ease satisfaction procedure , would undergo procedure , would recommend friend . A 100 mm Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) use evaluate level pain , ease , satisfaction subject , anchor end line read `` pain ( easy , satisfy ) '' ( 0 mm ) `` pain ( complicate , satisfy ) '' ( 100 mm ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Adult patient 18 old Single arch double arch treatment Nonextraction treatment mandibular arch Presence full complement dentition first molar first molar No space mandibular arch Mandibular anterior irregularity index great 5 Patient healthy periodontium attachment loss 2mm The amount crowd allow bracket placement No therapeutic intervention plan involve intermaxillary intraoral extraoral appliance include elastic , lip bumper , maxillary expansion appliance , headgear prior complete alignment mandibular anterior teeth . Exclusion criterion : Failure provide oral write consent participation Medical problem affect tooth movement ( Refer Appendix I ) Presence primary teeth mandibular anterior area Missing permanent mandibular anterior teeth Inability place bracket anterior mandibular teeth Breakage mandibular anterior bracket replace within week
